DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics AZD7687 follow multiple ascend dose administration overweight obese otherwise healthy male subject
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedure suitable vein cannulation repeat venepuncture . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 27 35 kg/m2 Fasting serum ( S ) glucose ≥7.0 mmol/L nonfasting Sglucose ≥11.1 mmol/L screen . Any eating disorder actively attempt loose weight within 3 month prior enrolment . Smoking 7 cigarette per week time consent
